gmcm.crop_wither_chance.title: Crop Wither Chance
gmcm.crop_wither_chance.desc: The percent chance that any given crop may wither each day if left un-watered.
gmcm.use_rational_mitigation_formula.des: Replace the linear damage mitigation formula with a rational formula that gives more impactful but diminishing returns from the defense stat. *BEFORE: Damage -= Defense; AFTER: Damage *= 10 / (10 + Defense)*
